EmailTemplate.subject: AERO Patent Watch - April 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Title April 2015
Please find a link to the Aero Patent Watch – April 2015 <http://goaero.honeywell.com/r6070X2f0IAqRZQ4600v0G0>. The Aero Patent Watch provides a monthly view of published or granted patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark office by Honeywell or peer companies in our area of interest (Direct Link to Patents by Assignee <http://goaero.honeywell.com/x0Q0000f2840qZI0BG66RXv>).
As new issues are released, prior issues are moved to the Archive <http://goaero.honeywell.com/p0600Q04CX0v09ZIGq06Rf2> section. Additional Aero IP processes and background information is available at the Aero IP Community Wiki. <http://goaero.honeywell.com/uaZ000RI6q0G0D02f6vQX40>
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thank you, Dan Dan Gutfreund IP Process Leader Aerospace, Advanced Technology, Technology Strategy 21111 N 19th Ave (M/S 2J35A5) Phoenix, AZ 85027 Phone: +1 602 436-9030 Mobile: +1 480 258-8692 Dan.Gutfreund@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/a0200q01vQ0R00hXFIZr66G> Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2015 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
